attributes.action: Stop charging Value Added Tax on Vet’s bills.
attributes.additional_details: Immediately stop value added tax on Vet’s bills because it is the right thing to do.
attributes.background:
To add 20% value added tax to a Vet’s bill is unfair. It is a necessity not a luxury to ask for a vet’s assistance. The alternative is to not call the vet in because the cost is unaffordable.
Every being suffers. This is an unfair tax and causes unnecessary pain and debts.
